name: BOOM! - Open Beta
description:
Battle it out with friends in the early prototype of BOOM! Play local multiplayer matches to see who can reign victorious in this all new Tank Shooter! Please note that this is only a very early prototype that was made in someones bedroom so it's very rough.

Disclaimer-

All assets are mostly owned by Unity and they possess the right to remove this game and this page.

Developed in Unity 5.3.5

Controls

Player 1 controls tank with WASD and fires with SPACE

Player 2 controls tank with directional keys fires with and ENTER
